effect.diamond_pearl: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.platinum: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.platinum: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.
